sections.text:
76-2237.Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice; rules and regulations.

Each credential holder shall comply with the Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice. The board may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to assist in the enforcement of the Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice.

SourceLaws 1990, LB 1153, § 37;Laws 1991, LB 203, § 41;Laws 1994, LB 1107, § 38;Laws 2001, LB 162, § 29;Laws 2006, LB 778, § 59;Laws 2007, LB186, § 21;Laws 2010, LB931, § 20;Laws 2015, LB139, § 58.
